description:
This market refers to the Honor of Kings match between Team WE and Royal Never Give Up in the King Pro League Stage 1 Group 2, scheduled for January 16 at 4:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Royal Never Give Up" if Royal Never Give Up wins 3 or more games than Team WE in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Team WE".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market will resolve to "Team WE" if Team WE win against Royal Never Give Up in the named Honor of Kings match in the King Pro League Stage 1 Group 2, scheduled for January 16 at 4:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Royal Never Give Up" if Royal Never Give Up win against Team WE in the Honor of Kings match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/honorofkings/Main_Page.
events.title: Honor of Kings: Team WE vs Royal Never Give Up (BO5) - King Pro League Stage 1 Group 2

groupItemTitle: Game Handicap: RNG.M (-2.5) vs Team WE (+2.5)
